text: The Youth Olympic Games is a sporting event that takes place in a different city every four years for athletes between ages 14 and 18. The first Youth Olympic Games was held on 14 August 2010 to 26 August 2010 in the country of Singapore. ==List of Youth Olympic Games== ===Summer Youth Olympic Games=== Edition Year Host City Host Nation Nations Competitors Sports Events Reference I 2010 Singapore 14 August 26 August 204 3,600 26 201 II 2014 Nanjing 16 August 28 August 204 3,787 28 222 III 2018 Buenos Aires 6 October 18 October 28 185 IV 2026 Dakar Future event Future event Future event Future event Future event Future event Future event Future event Future event ===Winter Youth Olympic Games=== Edition Year Host City Host Nation Nations Competitors Sports Events Reference I 2012 Innsbruck 69 1,059 7 63 II 2016 Lillehammer 71 1,100 7 70 III 2020 Lausanne Future event Future event Future event Future event Future event == References ==
title: Youth Olympic Games
